Configuration changes on network devices.Action: Monitor Zeek syslog logs and relevant Windows Event IDs (e.g., 4688 for script execution, or specific management software events) for configuration changes on network devices. Filter for keywords related to 'boot', 'image', 'version'. Use correlation analysis to link configuration changes to potential downgrade activity.

File transfer or modification events ass.Data: Zeek ftp.log, Zeek smb.log, Zeek files.log, Windows Event ID 4656, Windows Event ID 4663
File transfer or modification events ass.Action: Monitor Zeek logs (ftp.log, smb.log, files.log) and Windows Event IDs (4656, 4663) on servers potentially storing device images for file transfer or modification events involving network device image files. Identify unusual file access patterns using statistical methods (e.g., frequency analysis, time series analysis) and correlate with configuration change events.
